content: this crochet pattern is very easy to follow and creates the most beautiful and easy traditional french beret with a lovely feminine vibe it s super beginner friendly and can be made up in the space of just one or two hours it features a simple one round repeat throughout creating a lovely textured design this pattern is written in us terms with british terms in brackets and is 12 pages long with lots of photos in depth explanations and a link to the video tutorial for this project you will need 1 skein of caron simply soft yarn in shade soft green or 2 skeins of 100% cotton drops paris in shade 20 a 5 mm crochet hook a tapestry needle a pair of scissors a stitch marker optional if you have any questions you can contact me thank you for stopping by and happy crochet
